alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 7:37PM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to 4-6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Heavy snow will accumulate on tree branches and powerlines, possibly causing them to break and lead to power outages. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
